title: Ledian’s Ace
desc:
Post 1282
- You can only draw this card if your Ledian. If you’re not, this card is rule 10’d. If this card can not be rule 10’d, it is considered a <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> card. Rule 10 it.
- You are encouraged to make your own Ace at around the same power level, and include a theme song.
- The next player draws 4 cards.
- If you ever draw cards, you may instead **Suffocate.**
- Everyone draws a card.
- Choose a player, they are **Injured.**
- https://youtu.be/pF1n0GflZMg
